lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace manager Alan Pardew says his side must maintain their concentration for the full 90 minutes this weekend or risk being punished by a confident Liverpool side.

headline.print_headline: Pardew Wants Palace to Step Up Focus Ahead of Liverpool Game
headline.main: Pardew Wants Palace to Step Up Focus Ahead of Liverpool Game

snippet: Crystal Palace manager Alan Pardew says his side must maintain their concentration for the full 90 minutes this weekend or risk being punished by a confident Liverpool side....
